Nano Banana Pro

API Request

curl --request POST \\
  --url https://api.kie.ai/api/v1/jobs/createTask \\
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \\
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  --data '{
    "model": "nano-banana-pro",
    "callBackUrl": "https://your-domain.com/api/callback",
    "input": {
      "prompt": "A beautiful landscape with mountains and lakes",
      "resolution": "1K",
      "aspect_ratio": "1:1",
      "output_format": "png"
    }
  }'

Input Object Parameters

Parameter Type Required Default Description
prompt string Yes - Text prompt (max length: 20000)
image_input array No [] Input images (max items: 8)
aspect_ratio enum No 1:1 Options: 1:1, 2:3, 3:2, 3:4, 4:3, 4:5, 5:4, 9:16, 16:9, 21:9, auto
resolution enum No 1K Options: 1K, 2K, 4K
output_format enum No png Options: png, jpg

Pricing

Price: $0.018 USD per generation

Credits: 18 credits for 1K and 2K resolution, 24 credits for 4K
